page.title: 19GOVERNMENT-PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: At the Annual local government meeting of the Parish Council officers were re-elected.Two members will attend a meeting regarding the listed buildings Re-Survey at Southwell. Considerable improvement in the covering of loads on lorries was reported.It was agreed to invite the Manager of the Power Station to attend a future meeting of the Parish Council.It was agreed that the Planning officer be informed that it was felt that the present village plan did not cater for elderly people nor for young people and did not provide for modern needs and future development.It would be desirable for bungalows to be built in Averham for old people.It was agreed to enlist the aid of the Health Officer regarding damage to wild life in the countryside.
